text: bal ayqwl hwla' almshrkwn: 'iina mhmdana akhtlq hdha alqran? qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: 'iina akhtlqth ealaa allah fa'iinakum la taqdarun 'ana tdfeu eaniy min eiqab allah shyyana, 'iina eaqbny ealaa dhalik. hu subhanah 'aelam min kuli shay' sawaah bima taqulun fi hadha alqran, kfa biallah shahdana ely welykm, wahu alghafur liman tab 'ilyh, alrahim bieibadih almwmnyn
